job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates a direct involvement in enhancing the capabilities of an AI system, which aligns with the core concept of model improvement.

job_tasks.phrase: Review AI-generated solutions and provide detailed feedback and participate in AI model fine-tuning sessions
job_tasks.justification: The direct mention of 'AI model fine-tuning' explicitly places this task within the 'Modeling' category.

job_tasks.phrase: Integrate technical human expertise and AI capabilities to deliver exceptional customer support
job_tasks.justification: This phrase suggests the practical application and integration of AI capabilities into a service, which is a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Prototype and test new AI tools and methodologies
job_tasks.justification: Prototyping and testing AI tools and methodologies directly relates to the development and experimentation with AI models.
The job description focuses on 'customer support,' indicating an understanding of business operations and customer service needs.

soft_skills.phrase: ramp up one several products within the first month (we are aware this is aggressive)

classification.rationale: While the role involves interaction with AI systems and fine-tuning, it lacks the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer such as advanced prompt engineering, RAG, or PEFT. The focus is more on customer support and improving existing AI solutions rather than building new generative AI applications.
